LO: They said that we should abolish the death penalty since executioner's feel responsible for killing death row inmates by their own hands. However, there are several solutions to minimize the sense of responsibility felt by executioners, besides just throwing out the death penalty. For instance, advances in technology make it possible to automate much, if not all, of the execution process, so no one has to feel they have blood on their hands, so to speak. Other methods for eliminating the feeling of sole responsibility include using a firing squad where only one gun is loaded with a real bullet, for instance. Would-be executioners could even draw straws to see who would carry out the task, taking out any element of choice that might make them feel responsible. So, this doesn't stand up as an excuse to abolish capital punishment.
